PreferenceCategory.android:title: Internal Sensors
PreferenceCategory.android:summary: Sensors integrated in the smartphone, requires no external device.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Accelerometer Data
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Activates data collection of vehicle acceleration. Event detection: hard acceleration and braking

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Location Data (GPS)
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Activates data collection of the vehicle location

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Rotation Data
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Activates data collection of vehicle orientation. Event detection: sharp turns

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Cabin Light Data
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Activates light sensor to measure ambient cabin light

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Front Camera
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Activates video capture with the phone's front camera

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Back Camera
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Activates video capture with the phone's back camera

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Speed Limit Data
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Activates queries to OpenStreetMap to detect speeding. Requires internet connection

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Weather Conditions
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Activates updates on the current weather conditions. Requires internet connection

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Heart Rate
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Activate heart rate logging from a connected Android Wear watch.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: OBD-II Data
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Activate OBD2 connection and vehicle data collection
